Description: Book of the Dead of Padiwesir on linen mummy-wrapping; black outline offering-vignette; Hieratic text.
Curator's comments: Published: Mosher, Catalogue of the Books of the Dead in the BM: The Papyrus of Hor, (2001), p.24 n.137.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (183)
